tool.name: GFF/GTF Feature Merge
tool.description: Merge GFF features based on a variety of criteria
tool.command: feature_merge $ignore_strand $exclude_components $exact_only $no_children -m $merge_strategy #for set in $features -f "${str($set.csv).replace(" ", "")}" #end for #for $input in $inputs $input #end for > $output

param.name: exclude_components
param.label: Include original feature records in output

param.name: exact_only
param.label: Only merge features with identical coordinates

param.name: no_children
param.label: Do not merge features with a Parent attribute

param.name: merge_strategy
param.label: ID conflict resolution strategy
param.option: merge: attributes of all features with the same primary key will be merged
append: entry will have a unique, autoincremented primary key assigned to it
error: exception will be raised. This means you will have to edit the file yourself to fix the duplicated IDs
skip: ignore duplicates, emitting a warning

repeat.name: features
repeat.title: Specify features to merge
repeat.help: Can be provided more than once to specify multiple merge groups. If not provided, all features will be merged.

param.name: csv
param.label: Feature set to merge
param.help: Comma seperated types of features to merge. Must be terms or accessions from the SOFA sequence ontology, ALL, or NONE

tool.help:
GFF/GTF Feature Merge Merge GFF features based on a variety of criteria.
https://github.com/brinkmanlab/feature_merge
